summary: Tweaked version of the mod from LPabon.
descriptionHtml:
I changed the passive effects, starter stats and power from LPabon Dremora Fully Playable Race:

Passive:
15% Magic Resistance
50% Fire Resistance
25% Ice Weakness
Immunity to diseases and poisons.

Power:
Oblivion's Embrace: Summons a Fire Cloak that deals 20 points of damage per second for 5 minutes.

Starting Bonuses:
+10 Smithing
+10 Two-Handed
+10 Heavy-Armor
+5 Block
+5 One-Handed
+5 Enchanting
+5 Conjuration

Requires the newest Skyrim update.
My other mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53472/?]UH - Unique Housecarls[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53547/?]Daedric 1H better than Ebony 1H[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53669/?]Better Reward for destroying the Dark Brotherhood[/url]
author: LPabon and Spr1t3
